content:
# I now have a total of 8 stone in my inventory, but I still don't have enough to craft a Stone Furnace, which requires 3 stone. I need to gather more stone to reach the required amount.

# I will continue harvesting stone from the resource patch until I have at least 3 more stone, bringing my total to 11 stone.

harvest_resource(stone_position, quantity=5)  # Gather more stone from the resource patch
print(f"Inventory after gathering more stone: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory after gathering more stone
